World's Money and Markets

I came across this really cool visualization of all the money in the world. This was created by The Money Project.

Some really interesting stats:

  • There is approximately $215 trillion of global debt, and 33% of it (70 trillion) was added in the last decade alone
  • Crypto is the fastest growing asset class in the world, but is tiny when compared to other things like real estate
  • The derivatives market size is legitimately bonkers

Here’s the visualization itself:
